name: Insurance Ireland
goal: Insurance Ireland is the voice of insurance in Ireland respresenting the interests of both the domestic market and the international re/insurers and captive managers located in Ireland and transacting prefominantly non-domestic insurance and reinsurance business.
interests: Banking and financial services, Climate Action, Competition, Economy, finance and the euro, Single market, Taxation, Trade
